--- select_tablesample_with_table_alias.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers AS S TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    end:      65,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    List:     parser.SelectExprList{
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  9,
        end:  10,
        Expr: nil,
        Star: true,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
    },
    From: parser.FromItemList{
      &parser.FromItem{
        end:  65,
        Expr: &parser.TableName{
          end:   30,
          Ident: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  18,
            end:  25,
            Name: "Singers",
          },
          Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
          As:   &parser.Ident{
            pos:  29,
            end:  30,
            Name: "S",
          },
        },
        Method: "BERNOULLI",
        Num:    &parser.IntLit{
          pos:   54,
          end:   56,
          Value: "90",
        },
        Rows: false,
      },
    },
    Where:   nil,
    GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
    Having:  nil,
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers AS S TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI(90 PERCENT)
